reviews.review: Контра то крутая игра, но если не переделывать её под КСГО, то осталась бы такой же.
There is no need for you to listen to the review, Its fuccin* CS just get it っ◔◡◔)っ
Классика, сколько же игр было сыграно в ней, сколько часов было потрачено!
melhor game de fps, para zoar de madrugada
This is the memory of a generation. I was born in 2000. This is the memory of my childhood
Эххх. Вспомнил своё детство.  13 GO GO GO  из  5
Clasico cs tendra mucho tiempo pero sigue siendo muy divertido jugar con amigos y mas para nosotros los venezolanos que no tenemos muy buenas PC pero igual seguimos con este juego 2022!!!

很小的时候第一次玩到CS，小时候一直都以为那个拿着AK47的手是根木头（
CS真的是什么玩法都有，一种玩腻了可以去玩另一种，像自己后来太菜打不过别人后就跑去玩KZ了（
not enough skill requierd this game is buggy and there are to many problems with ping too many problems with it.
People are posting reviews for CS in 2019???  Like, go find something to do with your life.  Playing CS would be a better choice.
Este juego es un clásico e inmortal, mas de 20 años y hay muchísimos jugadores y servers.
Passa o tempo, aparecem outros jogos mas vez ou outra acabo jogando CS. Não tem como colocar na categoria melhor enredo, mas é diversão para novos e velhos jogadores.
Melhor jogo de todos os tempos ! :D
Jogo clássico, CS 1.6 sempre será lembrado no coração de todos os fãs de FPS
永恒的经典，为童年补票
nao fiz parte dessa trocacao de tiro :(

a unica saudade que será,
será daquele tempo
que infelizmente
não voltará mais
Juego de mi infancia, Muy recomendado.
El diego armando maradona... aca papa, aca chabon.. fenomeno.. drogadicto... lo que sea papa.. YO TE LLEVO EN EL ALMA LOCO.. ESTE ES EL MAS GRANDE.. ESTE SE LA JUGO POR LA ARGENTINA..
I mean it is CS 1.6 there is nothing else to say

so first i was a console gamer mostly playong call of duty but after the games from them i decided to move to pc just because the games are the same but gaming experience is better the first game i bought was csgo en i thought it was really fun.
The game I grew up with. Childhood game. It will always remain in my heart.
Всё просто. Это игра всех времён.
O melhor jogo das nossas vidas!
Игра в которой много воспоминаний и разных эмоций ! Советую всем!
best game for low spec players
Одна из лучших for all time!
Its fucking awsome!Much better than cs go!

Эххх....1.6...не игра, а настольгия.
Помню,как с батей по локалке гоняли против друг друга,как я играл на сервах приватных...
